subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: After Brazil goalkeeper Júlio César had made two shootout saves, Gonzalo Jara hit the right post, and the ball bounced back across the mouth of the goal and safely away.
snippet: After Brazil goalkeeper Júlio César had made two shootout saves, Gonzalo Jara hit the right post, and the ball bounced back across the mouth of the goal and safely away.
